0.3.name: wordpress/scrim-email-saver
0.3.description:
Do your users leave their Email IDs in their comments and you want to prevent that? Well, then this plugin is pefect for you!

The plugin filters your blog's comments and bbPress forum posts for email IDs and converts them into Scr.im links so that your users' email IDs do not get picked up by bots and they receive less (if not zero) spam.
